item.title: Allergic rhinitis
item.description: caused by hypersensitivity to allergens Symptoms runny [[nose]] itchy [[eyes]] sneezing

item.title: alveoli
item.description: place of gas exchange between air and blood through [[diffusion]] thin epithelium and capillary network

item.title: Asthma
item.description: due to allergens the mucus of the [[bronchioles]] thickens muscles cramp Symptoms shortness of breath suffocating cough wheezing

item.title: breathing
item.description: ![[inhalation]] ![[exhalation]] adults… inhale 16 times every minute exchange 0.5l of air breathing directed by the medulla

item.title: bronchioles

item.title: Bronchitis
item.description: caused by viruses or bacteria → inflammation of the [[bronchioles]] Symptoms strong coughing permanent in case of smokers solution lot of liquid consumption with expectorant

item.title: Common cold
item.description: caused by the [[rhino virus]] symptoms inflammation of the nasal mucosa runny nose

item.title: exhalation
item.description: [[diaphragm]] returns to standard state (bent), intercostal muscles relax → chest returns to resting position volume decreases → pressure increases → air pushed out

item.title: Flu
item.description: caused by several viruses Symptoms inflammation of… nasal mucosa [[pharynx]] headache fever painful joints

item.title: glucose
item.description: fehér, kristályos anyag vízben jól oldódik melegítve megolvad (150°C) stabil gyűrűs forma (<1% megnyílik → aldohexóz) [[aldohexóz]] kémiai tulajdonságok kémhatás semleges

item.title: heart

item.title: Human respiration
item.description: Tasks exchange of respiratory gases ($\ce{ O_{2} }$, $\ce{ C_{2}O }$) (in [[alveoli]] ) $\ce{ O_{2} }$ used in biological oxidation $\ce{ C_{2}O }$ end product of biological oxidation ([[glucose]] burning) gas export in the [[lung]] Inhalation [[nostrils]] → [[nasal cavity]] → [[pharynx]] → [[larynx]] → [[trachea]] → [[lung]]

item.title: illnesses of the human respiratory system
item.description: ![[Common cold]] ![[Flu]] ![[Bronchitis]] ![[Pneumonia]] ![[Allergic rhinitis]] ![[Asthma]]

item.title: inhalation
item.description: [[diaphragm]] flattens (becomes shorter) and intercostal muscles contract → chest rises [[lung]] expands → higher volume → lower pressure air enters

item.title: lung
item.description: main bronchi → [[bronchi]] → [[bronchioles]] → [[alveoli]] left - 2 lobes (space needed for [[heart]]) right - 3 lobes

item.title: nasal cavity
item.description: warms up, humidifies and cleans air mucous cleans inhaled air along with hairs in the [[nostrils]]

item.title: nostrils
item.description: hairs clean inhaled air

item.title: pharynx
item.description: [[tonsils]] found here way of food and air crosses here epiglottis close when we swallow

item.title: pleura
item.description: #info “savós folyadék” between [[lung]] and chest causes inflamation

item.title: Pneumonia
item.description: caused by viruses or bacteria Symptoms high fever strong coughing solution bed rest for 2 weeks antibiotics (when bacterial)

item.title: rhino virus
item.description: [!fail] This page does not exist (yet)!

item.title: tonsils
item.description: parts of the immune system that protects against pathogens by large density of white blood cells if infected, becomes the actual source of infection → removed

item.title: trachea
item.description: wall stiffened by C shaped cartilages → trachea may expand and contract 10-12 cm long tube divides into 2 main bronchi
